
# Household-Account
Save Money in Times of High Inflation

<img src="https://blog.kakaocdn.net/dn/tPPrk/btsJPCAM1gP/3kNpktpRlAmnfKt4E6bhOK/img.png" width=410 />

# USE
```bash

$ Household-Account <Expense> <Amount> <Category>

```

## DEV
```bash
$ git clone ...
$ pdm venv create
$ source .venv/bin/activate
$ pdm install
$ pytest
```
